headline: Yum! Brands’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Yum! Brands delivered a quarter that modestly exceeded Wall Street’s revenue expectations, underpinned by ongoing strength at KFC and Taco Bell. Management highlighted the impact of digital adoption, with nearly 60% of systemwide sales now generated through digital channels, and noted robust international development, particularly at KFC. CEO Chris Turner cited Taco Bell’s continued market share gains and KFC’s record unit growth as key contributors. Turner emphasized, “Our digital capabilities
